mapper.insert: insert into cat(id, catname, catage, cataddress, comment01, comment02, comment03, comment04, comment05, comment06, comment07, comment08, comment09, comment10, comment11, comment12, comment13, comment14, comment15, comment16, comment17, comment18, comment19, comment20) values(#{id},#{catname}, #{catage}, #{cataddress}, #{comment01}, #{comment02}, #{comment03}, #{comment04}, #{comment05}, #{comment06}, #{comment07}, #{comment08}, #{comment09}, #{comment10}, #{comment11}, #{comment12}, #{comment13}, #{comment14}, #{comment15}, #{comment16}, #{comment17}, #{comment18}, #{comment19}, #{comment20})
